tool_description: Get standardized balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement for global companies going back 5 years.

api_list.name: Balance Sheet Statement
api_list.description: Retrieve the balance sheet statement of a company for a specified year. All numbers are in thousands.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company.

api_list.name: Cash Flow Statement
api_list.description: Retrieve the cash flow statement of a company for a specified year (ttm = Trailing Twelve Months). All numbers are in thousands.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company.

api_list.name: Income Statement
api_list.description: Retrieve the income statement of a company for a specified year (ttm = Trailing Twelve Months). All numbers are in thousands.

optional_parameters.name: ticker
optional_parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company.
